Women's Wellness Mobile Clinic

Oct 03, 2024

Take care of your health (and your family) with the Women’s Wellness Mobile Clinic on your Dallas College campus!

Dallas College’s Roberto Reyes Selected for HACU Leadership Academy

Oct 04, 2024

​Reyes is one of 45 fellows from across the country chosen to prepare for leadership roles in institutions of higher learning, emphasizing Hispanic-Serving Institutions (HSIs) and emerging HSIs.

  • Student Life
  • Community

New Programs Create Opportunities for Students Who Have Intellectual and Developmental Disabilities

Oct 04, 2024

Event re-occurring 2 weeks. This event will give an overview of the whole week's plans, as well as introductions to all the 'people-to-know' on campus.
